医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
特定的 HRT 片剂与心脏病和血栓风险增加有关瑞典发表的一项研究发现，某些同时含有雌激素和孕激素的激素替代疗法（HRT）片剂与绝经期女性患心脏病和罕见但严重的血栓（称为静脉血栓栓塞（VTE））的风险较高有关。今天的英国医学杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Specific-HRT-tablets-linked-to-increased-risk-of-heart-disease-and-blood-clots.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Specific-HRT-tablets-linked-to-increased-risk-of-heart-disease-and-blood-clots.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=593be639-aca5-4e0b-b643-9225ef27ca55 Thu, 28 Nov 2024 00:11:26 -0500 Specific HRT tablets linked to increased risk of heart disease and blood clots
化石燃料行业影响医学研究，引发伦理担忧《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项调查揭示了化石燃料行业参与医学研究的程度，引发了学术界和出版公司切断与公司联系的新呼吁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Fossil-fuel-industry-influences-medical-research-raise-ethical-concerns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Fossil-fuel-industry-influences-medical-research-raise-ethical-concerns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4e92b52-9b74-4dc5-bce9-b90426581caa Thu, 28 Nov 2024 00:02:00 -0500 Fossil fuel industry influences medical research, raising ethical concerns
Obe-cel 在治疗白血病方面表现出强大的功效和安全性复发或难治性 CD19 阳性 B 细胞急性淋巴细胞白血病 (ALL) 患者接受新型抗 CD19 嵌合抗原受体 (CAR) T 细胞疗法 obecabtagene autoleucel (obe-cel) 治疗后，缓解率很高，并且大多数患者根据德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心研究人员共同领导的 Ib/II 期 FELIX 试验的结果，不需要随后进行干细胞移植 (SCT)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Obe-cel-demonstrates-strong-efficacy-and-safety-in-treating-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Obe-cel-demonstrates-strong-efficacy-and-safety-in-treating-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d124aa8a-ed03-482f-9cd9-e0e32b23f0b9 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 23:42:20 -0500 Obe-cel demonstrates strong efficacy and safety in treating leukemia
新型 HIV 预防注射剂提供 96% 的保护为了使预防新发艾滋病毒感染的口服药物有效，患者必须采取某些行动，包括每三个月去看一次医生，最重要的是坚持坚持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/New-HIV-prevention-injection-offers-9625-protection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/New-HIV-prevention-injection-offers-9625-protection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51f98bc7-87dd-4336-ba92-73786f277de3 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 23:36:00 -0500 New HIV prevention injection offers 96% protection
研究将 CTE 男性攻击行为的综合危险因素联系起来根据 2024 年 11 月 27 日发表在《Neurology®》在线期刊上的一项研究，有精神疾病家族史的慢性创伤性脑病 (CTE) 患者在中年时出现攻击行为的风险可能更高。美国神经病学学会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Study-links-combined-risk-factors-for-aggressive-behavior-in-men-with-CTE.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Study-links-combined-risk-factors-for-aggressive-behavior-in-men-with-CTE.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=891358b6-e9fa-4339-99c0-acef60e094d9 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 23:29:14 -0500 Study links combined risk factors for aggressive behavior in men with CTE
CBT 和康复可能会改善长期的新冠症状《英国医学杂志》今天发表的最新证据综述发现，认知行为疗法（CBT）和身心康复计划可能会改善长期新冠病毒的症状，但效果有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/CBT-and-rehabilitation-likely-to-improve-long-covid-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/CBT-and-rehabilitation-likely-to-improve-long-covid-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52a681ab-febe-48af-a97e-f5438dd91b8c Wed, 27 Nov 2024 23:21:00 -0500 CBT and rehabilitation likely to improve long covid symptoms
研究为传播疾病的蜱虫的基因控制铺平了道路德克萨斯农工大学昆虫学系和美国农业部的研究合作为遗传工具控制疾病传播蜱虫创造了潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Research-paves-the-way-for-genic-control-of-disease-spreading-ticks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Research-paves-the-way-for-genic-control-of-disease-spreading-ticks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d3e15a9-d9a6-4a8d-8ebd-2294607c8909 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 23:16:19 -0500 Research paves the way for genetic control of disease-spreading ticks
调查：十分之七的欧洲家庭现已无烟根据 ERJ 开放研究今天（周四）发布的一项重大调查显示，欧洲十分之七的家庭是无烟家庭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Survey-Seven-out-of-ten-European-homes-are-now-smoke-free.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Survey-Seven-out-of-ten-European-homes-are-now-smoke-free.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b168bed-a9a9-4ae6-b75b-23e62d832087 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 23:10:00 -0500 Survey: Seven out of ten European homes are now smoke-free
更好的母亲饮食可以促进孩子的大脑发育和智商怀孕早期较高的母亲饮食质量与 10 岁和 14 岁后代的大脑容量更大和智商得分更高有关。社论解释了为什么产前营养在长期大脑和认知发展中发挥着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Better-maternal-diet-boosts-brain-growth-and-IQ-in-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Better-maternal-diet-boosts-brain-growth-and-IQ-in-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bff1fba7-69ae-48d1-b482-2a54c1fdc1bd Wed, 27 Nov 2024 23:10:00 -0500 Better maternal diet boosts brain growth and IQ in kids
针对细胞内检查点增强 NK 细胞免疫治疗自然杀伤 (NK) 细胞在针对癌症和病毒感染的先天免疫反应中至关重要，它们在肿瘤中的存在与各种癌症患者更好的治疗效果相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Targeting-intracellular-checkpoints-to-enhance-NK-cell-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Targeting-intracellular-checkpoints-to-enhance-NK-cell-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=286b5273-9e5d-4547-821d-9bf0b2175767 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 22:57:00 -0500 Targeting intracellular checkpoints to enhance NK cell immunotherapy
